name: VR Juggler Project
tagline: VR Juggler provides a cross-platform virtual reality application development framework
body:
### Getting VR Juggler
Download the project here, or check out the [VR Juggler Wiki Page](https://github.com/vrjuggler/vrjuggler/wiki) for more documentation.

### Community
Discussions about VR Juggler are hosted by Google Groups.
* [vrjuggler-devel](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/vrjuggler-devel) is for topics related to the development of VR Juggler
* [vrjuggler-questions](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/vrjuggler-questions) is a forum for asking questions relating to the use of VR Juggler

### Latest Discussions
